name: Jake Runzer
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I have been working with JavaScript recreationally and professionally for 5 years. I use TypeScript and React daily at work.
what_can_i_contribute: A lot of my work is with babel and writing custom transpilers. I hope to have conversations with others who do the same. I would also like to contribute to discussions about css-in-js, typed languages that compile to JavaScript, FP with JS, the state of frameworks like React, and the future and applications of web assembly.
